title: ministry script
content: where could i download free ministry script typeface? need it badly. thanks..
author: mizdntbstubborn

comments.content:
this is a joke right?  
You can buy it for $99 US from here: [http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000149](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070425/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000149 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000149")

Asking for free fonts on this forum is like asking for drugs at a Police convention

Can 'strangehands' be removed from Tyophile?

Stangehands, as Paul has mentioned this is not the place to be asking for free downloads of commercial fonts. If you absolutely need free fonts there are some legitimately free fonts available through the [FAQ Free Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070425/http:/typophile.com/node/14652).

"Asking for free fonts on this forum is like asking for drugs at a Police convention."

Couldn't this be written somewhere on Typophile's "home" page?

Well, it isn’t written on the police’s door either, is it? ;-)

There [used to be](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070425/http:/64.233.183.104/search?q=cache:www.typophile.com/wiki/FAQ_free) a [FAQ about free fonts on Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070425/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ_free), but it seems some nimrod has erased it.

_asking for drugs at a Police convention_

Right, small faces [they](http://web.archive.org/web/20111231070425/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/wackomaco/2319410336/in/pool-the_police) ain't.

And the baker will come  
And the baker I'll be

You know, maybe strangehands just doesn't know any better. I didn't understand font distribution as little as a couple of years ago, and I might have been stupid enough to ask that question here. Don't be so quick to condemn. Explain politely (as Miss Tiffany did), so that we don't lose another potential fontie to the club of exclusivity.

DrDoc, I retract the "Can ’strangehands’ be removed from Typophile?" sorry, also no-one said anything about my spelling of Typophile (it was a slip of the key)

Ok now can anyone tell me what Audi forum I can go to, I want to ask for a free Audi A3. I guess if you don't ask you don't get.  
ps. full size, working, preferably brand new, not really into ex demos. In NZ so I will need right hand side driving configuration.

@DrDoc: You didn't understand font distribution? Yeh I used to be a stocktaker, I used to take a lot of stock. (joking)

<cite>Ok now can anyone tell me what Audi forum I can go to, I want to ask for a free Audi A3.</cite>

No Porsche this time? At least you vary the car models.
